hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EWIH.EWIH_ID, EWIH.EWIH_ORDER_NO, EWIH.EWIH_LOGISTICNO_NO, EWIH.EWIH_WORK_ORDER_NO, EWIH.EWIH_STATUS_CODE, EWIH.EWIH_ISSUE_TIME, EWIH.EWIH_ISSUE_ADD, EWIH.EWIH_ISSUE_MESSAGE, EWIH.EWIH_REMARK, EWIH.CREATOR, EWIH.CREATE_TIME, EWIH.MODIFIER, EWIH.MODIFY_TIME, EWIH.REC_VER, EWIH.REC_STATUS, EWIH.ORG_ID, EWIH.PM_CODE, EWIH.TIME_ZONE from EO_WORK_ISSUE_HISTORY EWIH where 1=1 <<and EWIH.EWIH_ID LIKE :ewihId>> <<and EWIH.CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<and EWIH.CREATE_TIME=:createTime>> <<and EWIH.MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<and EWIH.MODIFY_TIME=:modifyTime>> <<and EWIH.REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<and EWIH.REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<and EWIH.ORG_ID LIKE :orgId>> <<and EWIH.TIME_ZONE LIKE :timeZone>> <<and EWIH.PM_CODE LIKE :pmCode>> <<and EWIH.EWIH_ORDER_NO like :ewihOrderNo>> <<and EWIH.EWIH_LOGISTICNO_NO like :ewihLogisticnoNo>> <<and EWIH.EWIH_WORK_ORDER_NO like :ewihWorkOrderNo>> <<and EWIH.EWIH_STATUS_CODE LIKE :ewihStatusCode>> <<and EWIH.EWIH_STATUS_NAME like :ewihStatusName>> <<and EWIH.EWIH_ISSUE_TIME =:ewihIssueTime>> <<and EWIH.EWIH_ISSUE_ADD LIKE :ewihIssueAdd>> <<and EWIH.EWIH_ISSUE_SYSTEM LIKE :ewihIssueSystem>> <<and EWIH.EWIH_ISSUE_MESSAGE like :ewihIssueMessage>> <<and EWIH.EWIH_REMARK like :ewihRemark>> <<and EWIH.EWIH_WORK_ORDER_NO in (:ewihWorkOrderNos)>> order by EWIH.EWIH_ISSUE_TIME desc
